message.name: INF_SEARCH_NO_RECORD_FOUND
message.locale: There are no matching validations based on the search criteria entered.

message.name: INF_SEARCH_RECORD_NOT_CONFIGURABLE
message.locale: The reference entered is for a validation that is not configurable. Only configurable validations will be returned in the search.

message.name: INF_SEARCH_NO_DISABLED_RECORDS_FOUND
message.locale: No configurable validations have been disabled.
